testsuite.name: ru.netology.AuthTest

testcase.name: Should successfully login with active registered user
Should get error message if login with not registered user
An error message should appear if you log in with the wrong login
An error message should appear if you log in with the wrong password
An error message should appear if you log in with a blocked registered user
